Equipment Actions.Action 1: Slam, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 13 Bludgeoning

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Water Elemental makes 2 Slam attacks
Other Actions.Action 2: Whelm, The Water Elemental attempts to Grapple all creatures in its space.  Those creatures make a Strength saving throw, taking an Average 13 Bludgeoning damage and becoming restrained and drowning on a failure

Abilities.Ability 1: Water Form, The Water Elemental's watery form allows it to enter other creature's space and move through narrow spaces
Abilities.Ability 2: Freeze, The Water Elemental is susceptable to Cold damage, partially freezing and slowing afterwards

Damage Resistances.Damage 2: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks
